name: Anu - a Myth's and Maze's tale
name_original: Anu - a Myth's and Maze's tale
description:
• Very hard difficulty - high level of frustration tolerance needed 
  • I know it has some bugs and various design flaws - but please let me know what you think - any feedback is highly appreciated
  • If you finish under 30 mins I need a video proof ;)

Hey guys,

I created Anu as a short single player demo for the pitch of my asymmetrical multiplayer game idea Myth's and Maze's (just the working title^^). Unfortunately I couldn't convince various publishers to give this project a chance... The lack of industry experience, not a complete team and no multiplayer prototype were the main reasons that made it too risky to invest...

I am more a game designer than a developer and I really have my problems when it comes to network replication stuff on UE4 and I don't have the time and energy to do finish the multiplayer prototype by myself...

Soo, I guess you already know where this is going ;)

If you are a skilled UE4/5 developer with experience in multiplayer games and with the serious interest and spare time to take part in such a project please let me know. I will send you some documents from the pitch so you get an idea of what the game is about^^

email: devs.mythsnmazes@gmail.com
discord: omg_itz_zen#2035
